MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:26am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs required. Our team are arranging for generators to be brought to site. We are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:08am on 9th January.
